description: You've been invited to a party, but you forgot to bring a gift. Turn Dash into a party game.

puzzles.description: Make Dash sing the Inputs and Outputs song when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: Dash likes to sing while spinning.

hints.description: Link the state with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: When Dash starts singing, make Dash instantly turn on white lights. Then make Dash automatically spin right (left wheel 30 cm/s, right wheel -30 cm/s).
puzzles.introduction: Use Moving Basics to make Dash's wheels go opposite directions to spin.

hints.description: Make sure the Moving Basics state is set to left wheel 30 cm/s and right wheel -30 cm/s. Link the states with an Instant cue and an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dash say "Oh no!" when the top button is released.
puzzles.introduction: If you let go of the button, your turn is over!

hints.description: Link the state with a Top Button Released cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Oh no!", make Dash automatically turn on red lights then automatically stop.
puzzles.introduction: Spinner Dash turns red and stops. Then it's the next player's turn.
